publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5654 Allan Wilson: The Draft Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2007—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Nicol Stephen*
